amendment.description: Amendment provides contractors of a federal water project in California and Oregon with ESA applicant status, ensuring that contractors are properly informed of and may provide input to ESA consultations that may impact operations of the project.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 114-204 to improve due process by providing contractors of a federal water project in California and Oregon ESA applicant status, ensuring that contractors are properly informed of and may provide input to ESA consultations that may impact operations of the project.

vote.text: On agreeing to the LaMalfa amendment (A007) Agreed to by recorded vote: 246 - 172 (Roll no. 444).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the LaMalfa amendment (A007) Agreed to by recorded vote: 246 - 172 (Roll no. 444).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. LaMalfa.
